Body:
instance = MagicMock()
trials = np.array([[0.1, 0.8, 0.2], [0.7, 0.6, 0.4], [0.4, 0.2, 0.3], [0.7,
    0.8, 0.9], [0.2, 0.3, 0.4]])
distributions = []
for column in trials.T:
    distribution = Univariate()
    distribution.fit(column)
    distributions.append(distribution)
instance._distributions = distributions
result = GaussianCopulaProcessMetaModel._transform(instance, trials)
expected_result = np.array([[-0.93051407, 0.72584367, -1.05823838], [
    0.78865964, 0.1155097, 0.3732126], [-0.04619363, -0.96388991, -
    0.49278658], [0.78865964, 0.72584367, 1.82607428], [-0.60472608, -
    0.66069297, 0.3732126]])
np.testing.assert_allclose(result, expected_result)
